title: Update perf test suite
body_html:
This PR updates various aspects of the perf test suite:

  • Hard exit when test script outputs warning or error, so that we can go in and fix them earlier
  • Reduced the allowed range of z-value, since the runtime of CPU perf tests are more stable now (by running them on OS X workers)
  • Moved perf test scripts to PyTorch account
body_text:
This PR updates various aspects of the perf test suite:

Hard exit when test script outputs warning or error, so that we can go in and fix them earlier
Reduced the allowed range of z-value, since the runtime of CPU perf tests are more stable now (by running them on OS X workers)
Moved perf test scripts to PyTorch account
body:
This PR updates various aspects of the perf test suite:

- Hard exit when test script outputs warning or error, so that we can go in and fix them earlier
- Reduced the allowed range of z-value, since the runtime of CPU perf tests are more stable now (by running them on OS X workers)
- Moved perf test scripts to PyTorch account
